about_the_game:
Need a break after saving Byteland? We've got something special for you!

Whether you're passionate about color palettes, eager to channel your inner Renaissance painter, or simply want to design a color-vibrant skin for Boti, look no further. Grab this coloring book and dive into an artistic extravaganza. The iconic characters and locations from Boti: Byteland Overclocked are waiting for you to bring them to life.
detailed_description:
Need a break after saving Byteland? We've got something special for you!

Whether you're passionate about color palettes, eager to channel your inner Renaissance painter, or simply want to design a color-vibrant skin for Boti, look no further. Grab this coloring book and dive into an artistic extravaganza. The iconic characters and locations from Boti: Byteland Overclocked are waiting for you to bring them to life.

supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
